title: primitive
description: Geometry and material.  WebGL: see drawElements() and drawArrays().

indices.description: The id (JSON property name) of the accessor that contains the indices.

material.description: The id (JSON property name) of the material to apply to this primitive when rendering.

primitive.description: The type of primitives to render.  Allowed values are 0 (POINTS), 1 (LINES), 2 (LINE_LOOP), 3 (LINE_STRIP), 4 (TRIANGLES), 5 (TRIANGLE_STRIP), and 6 (TRIANGLE_FAN).
